reviewText: Anything concerning Amityville is fascinating. But it all goes back to those 6 victims who lost their lives in November 1974. That will always be the true Horror!
I already knew most of the stuff it talked about it was still good though it is a very weird story indeed
I thought this was a GREAT movie with LOTS of information in regards to the Amityville---It's definitely worth having to your collection if you are into the Amityville!!
I saw this on TV a while back and was really excited to get it for this price, it sells for $59.00 on eBay
I remember seeing this special on the History Cannel and found it interesting.  I just wish there were a little more, not seen on TV.
I can't get enough of the Amityville stories.  Good to hear different perspectives on the topic.  Enjoyed it.  Happy with purchase.
